DataElement.preferredDefinition: An individual's age when the beginning of cognitive function loss as defined by the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, 4th Edition (DSM-IV) definition is noted.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An individual's age when the beginning of cognitive function loss as defined by the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, 4th Edition (DSM-IV) definition is noted.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

Property.preferredName: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, 4th Edition Onset
Property.preferredDefinition: Published by the American Psychiatric Association, the DSM is a listing of currently recognized mental health disorders and their diagnostic criteria, for children and adults. It includes statistical information on etiology, incidence, prevalence, age of onset and prognosis. The 4th edition was published 1994. As new information becomes available subsequent editions are published.:The start, beginning, or early stages. (NCI)

Concepts.longName: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, 4th Edition
Concepts.definition: Published by the American Psychiatric Association, the DSM is a listing of currently recognized mental health disorders and their diagnostic criteria, for children and adults. It includes statistical information on etiology, incidence, prevalence, age of onset and prognosis. The 4th edition was published in 1994. As new information becomes available subsequent editions are published.
The start, beginning, or early stages.
